name: Ramen VR
headline: Ramen VR is transforming game development with advanced XR + AI tools.
description:
XR + AI are the most fundamental computing shifts of the past century.
We're using XR and AI to build products that empower creators of online games and virtual worlds.

Meaningful games can change lives, and every game starts with its developers. We believe that game devs can change the world.
‍
We're a team of devs working on solving the hardest problems in game development. We previously built the #1 VR game Zenith: The Last City on Steam and Quest.

We've raised $40m+ to date and have been working in stealth on our next game as well as tools that will shape the future of game development.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:virtual-reality; industry:gaming; industry:social; industry:ar; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Lauren Frazier, Founder
founders.description: Lauren was everyone's favorite type of technical whiz kid: the one who takes devices apart, lays out the pieces, then gets bored and plays video games while you swear under your breath and rebuild your VCR. After graduating from UPenn with a Master's in Computer Science she worked for companies like Google and Unity before deciding to make the leap into game dev full time. She enjoys solving hard engineering problems in gaming, but if games don't work out she's also a Shakespearean actor.

founders.name: Andy Tsen, Founder
founders.description: CEO/Co-founder of Ramen VR. Product/Engineering/Game Development.

# HEROESAREMADE
Meaningful games can change lives, and every game starts with its developers. We believe that game devs can change the world. We're a team of devs working on solving the hardest problems in game development. We previously built the #1 VR game Zenith: The Last City on Steam and Oculus Quest. We've raised $40m+ to date and have been working in stealth on our next game as well as tools that will shape the future of game development.
[FIND OUT MORE](https://ramenvr.com/</who-we-are>)

generated_description:
Ramen VR is a San Francisco-based company focused on revolutionizing game development through advanced XR (Extended Reality) and AI tools. Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch S19, Ramen VR believes that meaningful games can change lives, and they see game developers as the key players in this transformative process.

Their team, which consists of 15 dedicated developers, previously created the well-received VR game `Zenith: The Last City`, available on platforms like Steam and Oculus Quest. The company has successfully raised over $40 million in funding and is currently working stealthily on their next game and development tools that are expected to redefine the gaming industry.

Ramen VR's mission is clear: empower creators of online games and virtual worlds by harnessing the latest in XR and AI technologies. They view game developers as world-changers and are committed to solving some of the toughest challenges in game development. 

With a solid grounding in innovation, Ramen VR's journey is one to watch as they continue to push the boundaries of what's possible in gaming. For more about their work and future projects, you can visit their website at [ramenvr.com](https://ramenvr.com/).
